heading: Validity of permit
text:
The issuance or granting of a permit shall not be construed to be a permit for, or an approval of, any
violation of any of the provisions of this code or of any other law or rule. Permits presuming to give authority to violate o r cancel
the provisions of this code or other law or rule shall not be valid. The issuance of a permit based on construction documents and
other data shall not prevent the commissioner from requiring the correction of errors in the construction documents and other data.
The commissioner is authorized to prevent any occupancy, use or work in violation of this code, the zoning resolution or other law
or rule enforced by the department.
